name: goodSleep_turnOn
description: This function is used to activate the 'good sleep' mode for a specified duration.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the good sleep mode.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration for which the good sleep mode should be activated.
